name: Galactic Errands
description:
Run your errands in a galactic shopping spree!

Get as many errands done as possible - all while avoiding crashing into rogue planets.

To play:

Click where you want to place a Gravity Well - which will draw your space-faring shopper towards it, and help them change direction. Hold the left mouse button down to preview the trajectory. Avoid crashing as long as possible, while collecting as many of the items you need as you can!

Created for Run Jam - https://itch.io/jam/runjam

All assets were created by Lee-Orr. The game was built using the Bevy game engine.

Source code is available here: https://github.com/lee-orr/run-jam
